description:
Luffy agrees to an alliance with Trafalgar Law, but the Straw Hats refuse to leave the island until the children are safe. Meanwhile, the gaseous master unleashes something very deadly!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Formed! Luffy and Law`s Pirate Alliance!
Un accord entre pirates. L’alliance de Luffy et Law !
Формирование! Пиратский альянс Луффи и Ло!
結成!ルフィ・ロー海賊同盟!
